title: #197:  Love Kills With John Potash
description:
Thank you so much for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back John Potash to discuss the history of Cortney Love life and the CIA and her possible involvement in three murders.... allegedly.
Thank you for your support.

Check out John Potash's movie: Drugs as Weapons Against Us: The CIA War on Musicians and Activists
by Amazon.com
Learn more: https://www.amazon.com/dp/6317581185/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_U_UFI9CbVX2ZPCS
